no_permission.title: You don't have the permissions to run this command.

parse_error.int_invalid: One integer argument is not a valid number.

help.more_help: More help can be found with the command: `{0}help <path>`
help.path_desc: 'path' is a list of names representing the path you go to a command or subcommand seperated by a `.`

about.description: Shows you some useless information about this bot.

permission.permission_not_found: The specified user already doesnt have this permission.

module.description: Allows you to enable and disabled modules on this server.

module.success_disabled: The Module is now disabled on this server.

testui.description: Tests if the UI Components work like the should.

dice.description: Rolls a dice with the specified amount of numbers for you.
